    • Libero ornare

Navbar

On larger screens, when a child menu is active, an overlay backdrop appears over the page content.




     







     







     







     




HTML

<nav class="selector-name mln mln--navbar" data-mln-breakpoint="768">
  <button class="mln__expand-btn" type="button" aria-label="Menu">
    <span class="mln__expand-btn__burger"></span>
  </button>
  <div class="mln__expander">
    <ul class="mln__list">
      <li><a href="#">Lorem ipsum</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">Sit amet</a>
        <div class="mln__child__mega-menu">
          ...
        </div>
      </li>
      <li><a href="#">Vulputate</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">Libero ornare</a>
        <ul>
          <li><a href="#">Lorem ipsum</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Sit amet</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Libero ornare</a></li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</nav>

JS

See options added below.

Note: include jquery.hoverIntent (recommended).

$('.selector-name').multilevelNav({
  'hoverIntent': true,
  'hoverIntentTimeout': 300,
  'navbarMenuBackdrop': true,
  'navbarMegaMenuBackdrop': true
});
